item.title: 市场怀疑美联储减息，债券市场陷入困境
item.description:
国债收益率重回4%以上。责怪鲍威尔，责怪特朗普，但不要假装选举已经结束。事实并非如此。【原文：

Treasury yields are back above 4%. Blame Powell, blame Trump, but don’t pretend like the election is already done. It’s not.

】

item.title: 欧洲反复出现的经济噩梦— 特朗普大选获胜
item.description:
各国央行行长担心，如果唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫，他将发动一场新的贸易战，这将大大增加他们的工作难度。【原文：

Central bankers are concerned that Donald Trump will unleash a new trade war if he returns to the White House, making their job much harder.

】

item.title: 2024 年英国最值得关注的初创企业
item.description:
《布鲁姆伯格》在英国搜寻了在人工智能、绿色科技、健康、金融等领域掀起波澜的最有趣的初创企业。【原文：

Bloomberg scoured the UK for the most interesting startups making waves in AI, green tech, health, finance and more.

】

item.title: 俄罗斯在欧洲液化天然气市场的份额增长，尽管存在担忧
item.description: 俄罗斯在欧盟液化天然气市场中的作用日益增强，即使欧盟正在权衡如何遏制来自该国的天然气供应。【原文：Russia’s role in the European Union’s liquefied natural gas market is growing, even as the bloc weighs how to clamp down on supplies from the nation.】

item.title: 揭秘俄罗斯油轮保险的神秘世界
item.description: 自俄罗斯入侵乌克兰以来，能源市场的一个悬而未决的问题是，谁来为运送莫斯科石油的油轮投保，以防发生灾难性漏油事故。【原文：One of the energy market’s open questions since Russia’s invasion of Ukraine has been who’s insuring the tankers moving Moscow’s petroleum against the risk of a catastrophic oil spill.】

item.title: 汽车制造商陷入两年来首次欧洲销量下滑的泥潭
item.description: 由于欧洲经济持续停滞，消费者削减开支，欧洲 9 月份汽车销量出现两年多来的首次连续下降。【原文：Car sales in Europe fell in September for the first consecutive monthly decline in more than two years as the region’s economy continued to stagnate and consumers trimmed spending.】

item.title: 匈牙利将在福林动荡之际维持关键利率：决策指南
item.description: 在福林暴跌之后，匈牙利央行表示可能将继续维持宽松货币政策，匈牙利准备维持利率不变。【原文：Hungary is poised to keep interest rates unchanged after the central bank signaled monetary easing would likely remain on hold following a plunge in the forint.】

item.title: 印尼央行进行干预，因特朗普和美联储忧虑情绪对印尼盾构成压力
item.description: 由于交易商认为唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在美国大选中获胜的可能性更大，而且美联储的宽松步伐将更加稳健，因此印尼央行对货币市场进行了干预，以支持印尼盾。【原文：Bank Indonesia intervened in currency markets to support the rupiah as traders price in greater prospects of a Donald Trump victory in the US elections and a more measured pace of easing by the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 在创纪录的 33 亿美元首次公开募股后，现代汽车首次在印度上市交易
item.description: 2024 年 10 月 16 日（星期三），印度新德里，现代汽车印度有限公司经销商的招牌。印度不受监管的灰色市场表明，现代汽车印度公司首次公开募股33亿美元（有望成为印度有史以来规模最大的一次公开募股）的热潮正在降温。【原文：Signage at a Hyundai Motor India Ltd. dealership in New Delhi, India, on Wednesday, Oct. 16, 2024. India's unregulated gray market is indicating that the excitement around Hyundai Motor India's $3.3 billion initial public offering — poised to be the country's biggest ever — is cooling.】

item.title: 印度现代汽车公司首次公开募股（IPO）上市前牛市迎来希望之光
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 印度卢比因石油和中国轮换风险而缓慢走低
item.description: 印度卢比本月跌破 84 美元兑 1 美元的汇率，创下历史新低，随着地缘政治风险提振油价，以及资金在转向中国的同时流出本地股市，印度卢比正走在下行的道路上。【原文：The Indian rupee, which fell past 84 to the dollar to hit a new record low this month, is on a downward path as geopolitical risks boost oil prices and as money flows out of local stocks amid a shift toward China.】

item.title: 交易员减少降息押注，各地债券纷纷抛售
item.description: 从澳大利亚到日本的债券都在下跌，因为投资者在考虑美国减息放缓的前景，这种趋势有可能危及各地的债务状况。【原文：Bonds from Australia to Japan are falling as investors mull prospects of slower US interest-rate cuts, a trend that risks upending debt positions everywhere.】

item.title: 热带风暴特拉米携暴雨向菲律宾逼近
item.description: 热带风暴 "特拉米 "正向菲律宾主岛移动，预计在登陆前将加强，并带来暴雨，威胁水稻作物。【原文：Tropical Storm Trami is moving toward the main island of the Philippines and is expected to strengthen before making landfall, bringing heavy rain and threatening rice crops.】

item.title: 香港沽空量在反弹中降至 2021 年以来最低点
item.description: 在中国一系列刺激措施推动香港股市反弹之后，香港股市的卖空活动是三年半以来最不活跃的。【原文：Short selling in Hong Kong stocks is the least active in three and a half years, after a series of Chinese stimulus measures drove a rally on the city’s bourse.】

item.title: 中国财富基金今年发行创纪录的 290 亿美元债券
item.description: 中国主权财富基金旗下的中央汇金投资有限责任公司（Central Huijin Investment Ltd.）有时会购买股票以稳定股市。【原文：Central Huijin Investment Ltd., a unit of China’s sovereign wealth fund that has at times bought equity to stabilize the stock market, issued bonds that pushed its total local debt sales this year to a record.】

item.title: 现代汽车印度公司将在印度有史以来规模最大的首次公开募股后首次亮相
item.description: 现代汽车印度有限公司（Hyundai Motor India Ltd.）的股票将于周二在孟买开始交易，该公司首次公开募股的规模为 33 亿美元，是南亚国家有史以来最大的一次。【原文：Shares of Hyundai Motor India Ltd. are set to start trading in Mumbai on Tuesday after a $3.3 billion initial public offering that was the South Asian nation’s largest ever.】

item.title: 据称马来西亚国家石油公司考虑出售可再生能源部门 Gentari 的股份
item.description: 据知情人士透露，马来西亚国家石油公司（Petroliam Nasional Bhd.）正在考虑出售可再生能源公司Gentari Sdn.的少数股份，以帮助扩大业务。【原文：Malaysia’s Petroliam Nasional Bhd. is considering selling a minority stake in renewable energy firm Gentari Sdn. to help expand the business, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 私人信贷经理门罗向 Wendel 出售大部分股权
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，Wendel 已同意收购私人贷款公司 Monroe Capital 的多数股权，该公司管理着近 200 亿美元的资金。【原文：Wendel has agreed to acquire a majority stake in private lender Monroe Capital, which manages almost $20 billion, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 东京地铁上市考验日股胃口
item.description: 东京地铁公司（Tokyo Metro Co., Ltd.）是世界上最大的地铁系统运营公司之一，作为六年来最大的一次上市，该公司的首次交易将考验日本股市的牛市行情。【原文：The trading debut of Tokyo Metro Co., which runs one of the world’s largest subway systems, will test the bull case for the Japanese stock market as its biggest listing in six years.】

item.title: 交易商消化美联储加息观点，黄金稳定在历史高位附近
item.description: 在上一交易日创下历史新高后，黄金走势趋于稳定，因为交易商消化了美联储官员对美国利率未来走势的不同看法。【原文：Gold steadied, after hitting a record high in the previous session, as traders digested differing views from Federal Reserve officials on the path forward for US interest rates.】

item.title: 中国恢复购买，澳大利亚葡萄酒出口跃升三分之一
item.description: 在中国取消关税后，澳大利亚对中国的葡萄酒出口量增加，从而使澳大利亚的葡萄酒出口量猛增三分之一以上。【原文：Australia’s wine exports jumped by more than a third, boosted by an increase in shipments to China after the Asian nation lifted tariffs.】

item.title: 前情人丑闻让科技大亨身家缩水 30 亿美元
item.description: 澳大利亚亿万富翁理查德-怀特（Richard White）被指控与女性有不当行为，他表示自己与风险的关系很轻松。【原文：Richard White, the Australian billionaire battling allegations of inappropriate behavior with women, has said he has a relaxed relationship with risk.】

item.title: 前台湾中央银行官员称政策 "混乱"、不明确
item.description: 一位前台湾央行官员批评岛内货币政策前后不一，指责台湾央行行长杨金龙未能明确传达政策意图，引发了市场波动。【原文：An ex-Taiwan central bank official criticized the island’s monetary policy as being inconsistent, blaming Governor Yang Chin-long for failing to communicate policy intentions clearly and sparking market volatility.】

item.title: 交易商继续关注中东问题，石油价格在暴涨后趋于平稳
item.description: 在周一飙升近 2% 之后，石油价格趋于稳定，因为交易商追踪中东的紧张局势，而更广泛的市场则呈现出风险厌恶的基调。【原文：Oil steadied — after surging almost 2% on Monday — as traders tracked tensions in the Middle East, and broader markets carried a risk-off tone.】

item.title: 中国紧张局势凸显台湾核淘汰计划的风险
item.description: 王伯伟 50 岁时开始在台湾第四座核电站工作，一路升迁，负责监督核电站的建设和最终运营。【原文：Wang Bo-whei was 50 years old when he started working at Taiwan’s fourth nuclear plant, rising through the ranks to oversee its construction and — he thought — its eventual operation.】

item.title: Meta 使用面部识别技术打击假冒名人的欺诈行为
item.description: Facebook 母公司 Meta Platforms Inc. 将开始使用面部识别技术来打击利用名人照片使其看起来更合法的诈骗行为，这种策略被称为 "名人诱饵广告"。【原文：Facebook parent company Meta Platforms Inc. will start using facial recognition technology to crack down on scams that use pictures of celebrities to look more legitimate, a strategy referred to as “celeb-bait ads.”】

item.title: 亚洲股市将在华尔街下跌后下跌：市场综述
item.description: 由于华尔街股市在创下今年以来最长单周涨势后稍事喘息，大多数亚洲股市都将下跌。【原文：Most Asian shares were set for declines as Wall Street stocks took a breather after notching their longest weekly rally this year.】

item.title: 2025 年初食糖供应量将降至多年来最低水平
item.description: 据大宗商品交易商 Czarnikow Group Ltd.称，由于干旱阻碍了头号出口国巴西的生产，2025 年初全球食糖供应量将缩减至六年来的最低水平。【原文：Global sugar supplies are seen shrinking to the lowest level in six years in early 2025 as drought hampers production in top exporter Brazil, according to commodities trader Czarnikow Group Ltd.】

item.title: 酒店运营商 Aimbridge Hospitality 聘用顾问满足现金需求
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Aimbridge Hospitality 正在寻求 Evercore 公司的建议，因为这家第三方酒店管理公司希望充实其现金储备。【原文：Aimbridge Hospitality is getting advice from Evercore Inc. as the third-party hotel manager looks to shore up its cash reserves, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 首席执行官调查冲击股价
item.description: 早上好，我是悉尼的乔吉。澳大利亚两家著名的创始人领导的企业受到了市场的冲击。但首先......今日必读：- WiseTech 董事会审查针对首席执行官理查德-怀特（Richard White）的指控- Mineral Resources 调查向富豪创始人支付的款项- 澳航面临数百万美元的赔付【原文：Good morning, it’s Georgie here in Sydney. Two prominent Australian founder-led businesses have taken a market hit. But first...Today’s must-reads:• WiseTech board reviews allegations against CEO Richard White • Mineral Resources probes payments to tycoon founder• Qantas Airways faces a multi-million dollar payout】
